title: Employee benefits

h1.workingOrNotice: Do or did you receive any employee benefits?
h1.noLongerWorking: Did you receive any employee benefits?

label: Do or did you receive any employee benefits?
p1: For example, child care, company car, housing, health insurance etc.
benefitsTitle: What's classed as an employee benefit?
benefitsHelpTxt: Employee benefits (also known as 'benefits in kind') are the various types of non-wage compensation you get on top of your normal wages.

benefitsCharCount.required: Tell us about any benefits received
